website_summaries.verdict: The best military folding shovel that maximizes its usefulness with extra tools and gear stored in the handle.
pros: Multi-piece, long handle hides various survival tools such as an ax blade, paracord, hammer, fire starter, and bottle opener
Shovel is contoured with a serrated edge for chopping and digging
cons: Some of the survival accessory tools are too small to effectively cut and saw quickly

customer_reviews.title: Shovel quality is very low
customer_reviews.text: Recently I bought this shovel. I took a shovel on the beach, play with the kids. And after 4 days the iron part of the shovel exploded in half. I dug only the sand, I do not understand why the iron in this shovel is of low quality. I am very disappointed and will demand a refund or replacement
customer_reviews.author: Ruslan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tool - part of my permanent backpack kit
customer_reviews.text: Great tool - very lightweight but very sturdy (both are very important to me) - I intentionally "overworked it" to see if it would be damaged, but it was not, not in the slightest. Very pleased - this shovel is now part of my permanent backpack kit.
customer_reviews.author: Private Citizen

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, light, and so. many. functions.
customer_reviews.text: The last multi-tool shovel I bought felt like a plastic piece of crap held together by hopes and marketing. This bad boy feels like it could laugh off the apocalypse. It doesn't fold down super small, but despite feeling incredibly solid, it was also impressively light. I could hack up hard dirt, remove sturdy roots, etc. and I never felt like I had to be gentle with it. I also liked how easy to clean the steel spade was.
customer_reviews.author: bclaymier

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed with this product
customer_reviews.text: Chopped a few small trees, around 1 inch in diameter and the blade of the shovel cracked down the middle. Very disappointed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: chad wurster

customer_reviews.title: Super cool, sturdy, and lightweight!
customer_reviews.text: Super cool tool, sturdy and lightweight! Feels like a tool from a James Bond movie!
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Compact, Light, & Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It is light and rugged. Just realize it is a SMALL item. I wanted this for a specific purpose, it fit that bill exactly. If small and tough is what you are looking for, this it it. ---update--- I've been taking this into the field with me. I just spent two VERY wet & humid weeks at Ft Polk, and this little shovel performed quite well. It chopped saplings, dug trenches, cut cords, hammered tent stakes, scraped mud off vehicles, and got borrowed by everyone in sight. I kept having to go track the poor thing down as it passed from Soldier to Soldier.
customer_reviews.author: Olaf Lutherson

customer_reviews.title: Handy little thing
customer_reviews.text: Had a bonfire where we had to create our own pits. Although tedious because it was on the smaller size it still was very useful and not as bad as the days we stomped the crates and used boards to shovel the pits. It was also useful to hack the wood up. I’m CERT certified and this will definitely go in my kit.
customer_reviews.author: Trixie33

customer_reviews.title: Why sell together if not compatible?
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shovel kit with the extension kit as well and they are not compatible, why say other shoppers bought these items if you can't use them together?
customer_reviews.author: Robert H.

customer_reviews.title: Decent product, images presented do not  represent the product true size
customer_reviews.text: It is FAR smaller in person, for the price tag you would expect twice the size. I understand it’s meant to be small but I’ve got more indestructible garden tools that are this size and wayyyy cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: adam

customer_reviews.title: Rockwell hardness test
customer_reviews.text: Rockwell hardness test done witch is a sign of high quality, most people don't know that in a batch you take a sample to test, and that dimple is made, am very happy to get the one tested
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: This is quality!
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit that I was extremely hesitant with the price point of this shovel. I was looking for a lightweight shovel that would have multiple uses for me to take on long camping trips. This shovel is an extremely high quality with many more uses than I expected. This shovel should last me for a very long time. Thanks so much for this product!
customer_reviews.author: Levi Lee Haines

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shovel
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Very solid. I used it 2 days. I wasn't nice with it and it held up. I chopped,dug, and saw threw a lot of the woods. Worth it. A good buy
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: A gift WIN!
customer_reviews.text: Big HIT with the hubby - loves all the features, one of those gifts that he wouldn't buy himself (he's thrifty?) but for the doomsday prepper, boy scout always be prepared type like my hubs, this was perfect - like a kid with a new toy, his face lit up especially after inspection and seeing that good quality and all the tools. He's tough to buy for and I'm so glad I stumbled on this recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: MarieW

customer_reviews.title: If I was lost in the wilds this shovel and a fire starter would get me through
customer_reviews.text: This is the Swiss Army knife of small camp shovels, the quality is very high ,solid workmanship ,high quality material , this bad boy could double as a weapon , the knife/ saw blade in the handle is sharp and actually functional. Like a lot of folks I have had a few military folding shovels but this is like comparing a sling shot to a shotgun it's that much better
customer_reviews.author: Irish Dave

customer_reviews.title: Adequate for snow.
customer_reviews.text: If you need to actually dig a hole, there is no place to push the blade into the dirt with your foot. Boot slippage when wet, have to hold the shovel at an angle to get it into the sod. I'll keep it in my D90 for emergencies, but buying a different shovel for my pack.
customer_reviews.author: Ghostbunney

customer_reviews.title: Looks good maybe mine wasn't up to spec couldn't take the breathing when it came down to it.
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift for my father he loved it but after we finally got a chance to try it at camp it became chipped from rocks and bent from trying to dig....it was unfortunate but we still got the job done made for a good laugh. I wouldn't say we did anything too harsh maybe the ground was too tough idk but anyway can't be used for digging much now. I love the fire starter though even scaled some fish.
customer_reviews.author: Tuxedo Man

customer_reviews.title: and be glad it's there
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my bug-out bag as it checked off quite a few boxes.... Decently built, allows for personal touches, boil it down to it's core and it's a wicked PDW, and it doesn't take up much space. Everyone with a side-by-side, adventure bike, or UTV should have one of these stashed somewhere on the vehicle for that "once in a lifetime adventure" . Sharpen all the edges your personal taste, because they are NOT out of the box... stash some firestarter media of your choice in the striker handle, and be glad it's there. A hi-viz color offering on the handle for the "Non Tactical" among us might be appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: WireFryer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely tough
customer_reviews.text: Definitely sturdy, the rope on end would not fit on my wrist so I took it off, I like it, it is going in my kit , just the spade and blade cover, not bag. There is a little space for a mini survival kit inside the spade. Like just an inch by inch space, the knife, and fero rod and whistle all work well
customer_reviews.author: Zealander

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY THE RECOMENDED RS HANDLE(S) FOR THE C1 SHOVEL
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the shovel and the recommended handle extensions. The extension recommended with the FiveJoy Military Folding Shovel does NOT fit. Now that I understand the error the handles (2 in a package) only fit the RS shovel although they are recommended while purchasing the C1 shovel. 3 stars because I have not used the shovel yet.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Very good shovel with a couple of small issues
customer_reviews.text: While this was only for emergency use, I have put the shovel together a couple of times and it seems to be very well made and stronger than some other such items. The only couple of things that seem to be deficient are that the directions indicate a whistle is located near the top of the handle, but there only appears to be a small hole there. Also, while there is a length of paracord attached to the handle, the method of attachment is not clear and likely it needs to be cut in order to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Usefull for camping/hiking trips.
customer_reviews.text: Small. Light. Can strap to my belt and hike with it easy. Not the most sturdy item the world. Has weak points in design, but only if used for aggressive digging, like farming.or gardening. Works great for digging make shift fire pits, or camp site trenches. Moves alot of dirt for a small shovel. The flint on this is useless. The knife and whistle actually work very well.
customer_reviews.author: BlakeTWiley

customer_reviews.title: Great Item for the Hiker or preper.
customer_reviews.text: A nice addition to my pack. Hate to see all the bad reviews. #1 Remember Its a shovel not an Axe. Yes you can use it for small branches. Ferro Rod works great. Dont understand what other reviews talk about not having a striker. Use the knife included. Ultra light compared to standard folding shovels you can get at wallys. Might be made in china but no issues with the steel strength in this item. Used it to hammer in some Tent pegs with no issues no denting of the shovel.
customer_reviews.author: C & M

customer_reviews.title: Good initial impression for build
customer_reviews.text: The materials seem to be very rugged. Every part screws in securely and tightly. So far so good but I haven't used the shovel yet so it remains to be seen how well it holds up. One thing I'm not too hot about is that the section with the knife when taken off really doesn't seem to need the guard for safety sake, but it won't fit into the available opening of the main shovel with the guard on, so it's a bit troublesome but not a huge deal. I like the storage pouch also; it's very sturdy and looks like it should hold up.
customer_reviews.author: outdoorsy

customer_reviews.title: Bug out or for playing in yard
customer_reviews.text: Shovel arrived quickly after order and was a fun self purchase for Father’s Day. To say that this product is easy to use and understand is an understatement. If you need a beach, camping or bug out tool that can check the boxes and last BUY this!
customer_reviews.author: That guy 74

customer_reviews.title: Better than a Swiss Army Knife
customer_reviews.text: Can't speak to its durability since I haven't tested it just yet (I got it as part of my emergency kit for the car), but it seems decent if not exactly great. The quality of the materials considering the price is appropriate, but I would have liked something with a bit more heft, length, and ease of use for the tools included. Like most multi-tools, it's a quantity over the quality debate.
customer_reviews.author: PartisanGerm

customer_reviews.title: All aspects of the shovel and included tools are of ...
customer_reviews.text: All aspects of the shovel and included tools are of very high quality. The shovel head locks in to position very well with very little chance of it coming loose while being used in either the shovel or trenching positions. My only complaint is the same as others have said, the shovel head was smaller than I expected. I know FiveJoy offers a bigger version, I just thought this one was a little bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Schirmyver

customer_reviews.title: Kids toy
customer_reviews.text: There is a reason why they do not show this product in someones' hand. If you had to dig with it? It would take you 2 weeks full bore to dig a trench 4'x2'x24" and that's no joke. I did not want to try and rely on this thing out and about. The fire starter might throw a spark if you grind on it for a while and the threads take forever to take apart. If you like novelty items? this is for you!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money and is great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Such an awesome gift idea! My father loved this for his birthday. He uses it all the time and has had zero issues and it’s been about four years since he’s had it. Awesome ideas combining all the survival gear into one multi tool.
customer_reviews.author: SoVast

customer_reviews.title: It's tiny
customer_reviews.text: The videos made this appear much larger than it actually is. I have spoons bigger than the spade part. I returned it the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon W.

customer_reviews.title: I love the features of this tool
customer_reviews.text: I love the features of this tool, as well as how solidly it is constructed. I will update this review when I'm able to use the tool for the first time. I was disappointed that it is made in China, but, as I said, it seems to be solidly constructed. All of the tools and features will work great in a survival situation.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Branham

customer_reviews.title: A very sturdy, solid tactical survival shovel that serves as my ...
customer_reviews.text: A very sturdy, solid tactical survival shovel that serves as my winter survival shovel in case I end up in the ditch in a Wisconsin winter but also will be my companion on camping trips wherever I go. Great product, great price, good experience!
customer_reviews.author: ROCK

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! What a great product! This is very useful !
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Nice buy!
customer_reviews.text: Used it this weekend for 3 days in the woods . Has a great case that packed well in my bag and is great for digging holes. I even went as far as using as an axe on a small tree and it seemed to hold up very well. The lock collar design allows it to stay very sturdy .
customer_reviews.author: Dru

customer_reviews.title: Seems legit
customer_reviews.text: This little shovel offers allot. While not the lightest it is versatile. You can unscrew the fire striker end and screw it on the main handle allowing you to dump the knife section of the shovel to save weight. Will be using it on trail.
customer_reviews.author: tnyl83

customer_reviews.title: Good quality feel
customer_reviews.text: I just got the shovel in the mail. Good quality feel. The shovel blade is thick so it feels like it will hold up to normal use. Using it as an axe feels like it might actually work unlike some other brands. If it falls apart or is otherwise junk I'll update the review.
customer_reviews.author: michael bailey

customer_reviews.title: Class A top shelf.
customer_reviews.text: Well on arrival the box opening went well LOL .1 The case is heavy duty canvas like material not some cheap material. 2 Overall construction is class A top shelf. 3 Assembly was easy . 4 Enough room in case for other things like a mag light and container with water proof matches some first aid etc...next to Shovel blade and handle .So case has unused space.If it works like the video's show it's an all win win worth the price. 😎Belt loops are Velcro too so if you use the carry strap you could easily use belt loops for extra equipment like a hand Ax,looped water bottle etc
customer_reviews.author: Gadss999

customer_reviews.title: Great multi funtion shovel.
customer_reviews.text: Love this shovel. A great addition to anyone's outdoor adventure accessories. NOTE: I accidently left a one star review for this product. It was meant for a scammer seller. My Apologies. Sincerely Tom
customer_reviews.author: TOM

customer_reviews.title: Great for the bugout bag...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my hubby who had seen one advertised on FB. He liked this one, but commented that is was "small". To which I replied, well it's supposed to be small - in the end, I got this one for MY emergency bag. It's lightweight and takes up very little space. We ordered hubby a larger one. I have not had cause to use this yet, but it's like the "Swiss Army Knife" of shovels! Everyone should have one in their car.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for Father’s Day or B-day gift. My husband eyes became the ones of a young lad when he saw it. He pay with all moving parts and was very content with his gift. It made my day to see him so excited!
customer_reviews.author: Alvy71

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Lots of tools within a tool. All were great. The only reason I did not give it a five is it was a little shorter than I expected. It could really use a center section that could be screwed in to lengthen it a bit.
customer_reviews.author: RDG

customer_reviews.title: One thing I am somewhat disappointed in.
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with its compactness, quality and functionality. I will be trying this out at my first opportunity. One thing I am somewhat disappointed in... the belt straps. Wish there was an optional molle equipped carrying case so I could attach it directly to my backpack. It comes with two velco straps to attach to your belt and those straps do not match up to the webbing and it's impossible to put them through. No other complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Slick327EFI

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & usful
customer_reviews.text: Didn't cut tree saplings of 1 in, no biggie. Dug holes, that's for sure. The whistle works. Bag is sturdy and holds the shovel. I returned it though for a more expensive one. Excellent refund timing.
customer_reviews.author: Dillon A.

customer_reviews.title: it's a great product for camper and backpackers like me
customer_reviews.text: I have no word to describe it, it's a great product for camper and backpackers like me. One of the best all around survival tools.
customer_reviews.author: caregiver

customer_reviews.title: Product worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought for emergency and camping. Looks to be good quality and very handy. Haven't used it yet, but don't expect any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Di Ann

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nifty item...
customer_reviews.text: I have yet to use the item, but, from what I can see and feel, the all in one usefulness of this item seems sturdy and fairly light weight. I will update this review once I get a chance to use it, hopefully I the next couple of months
customer_reviews.author: Austin Michael Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Good price for a good quality and useful tool.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had a chance to use this product on a camping trip yet but I am certainly looking forward to it this spring-summer season. I like the quality of the product and I believe it should serve well for my needs when the time comes. It is a good price for a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Beetlekill

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this as a gift for my grandson's 12th ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a gift for my grandson's 12th birthday. He is very active in scouts and when he opened it his reaction was, "How did Grandma know to get this? It's perfect". He immediately attached it to his "survival" backpack. I did check with his dad first to see if it was appropriate. This is not a toy, it's a tool and should be treated as such.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: Nice Buy
customer_reviews.text: I got to use this product this weekend while camping. It is compact but carries a big punch. Found a small stump under my daughter's tent and was able to use the shovel portion of it to dig it out with out ease. The strap was comfortable around my wrist as well. I was surprised how easily everything fit back into the pouch after I had it all out looking at it. It is definitely worth the buy and will make it on all of my outdoor trips.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my 19 yo son as an early Christmas gift. He LOVES it! I think he loves this more than the smart TV he received! :) It is smaller than I thought (similar to other reviews) but very nicely constructed. It's also quite fun to find all the different functional tools. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn AF

customer_reviews.title: I think he's going to love it! Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift for my older son who likes to head out to the wilderness in spring, summer, fall and winter. I think he's going to love it! Sturdy, well-made and I love the compactness. He can put it right in his backpack. I know he'll get good use out of it for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl L Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Seems legit
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used yet but seems very well made. Impressed with the quality for the price. Will update if anything changes after using it
customer_reviews.author: Scott T

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, and well made. Now a permanent part of my vehicle emergency kit.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: I love the fact that there are so many uses for ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that there are so many uses for this compact tool. I used it on my camping trip over the weekend, and it worked as I expected (very well). A+
customer_reviews.author: KLH

customer_reviews.title: This thing is STURDY. Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Right on the the box it states its ready to be put to the test. This thing is STURDY. Exactly what I was looking for. I just wish the handle was a bit longer but, no need to knock off a star.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Dig Yourself Out of Anything
customer_reviews.text: This tool is very durable and can be relied on in a pinch or just because. the carrying pouches are made well and appear as though they'll last through years of service. The fact that there are so many tools packed into such a small frame is great. The multi-directional head on the unit makes endless possibilities for the uses,
customer_reviews.author: Christianna Youngblood

customer_reviews.title: What a tool
customer_reviews.text: Great item / great seller/fast shipping/ good communication/ will buy from in the future. AAA+++
customer_reviews.author: Mike Amado

customer_reviews.title: Very Useful
customer_reviews.text: This worked very well. I think it is more useful in an emergency situation than continued use such as camping / hiking. The axe / chopping portion of the blade dulls quickly. Other than that it is very sturdy and useful.
customer_reviews.author: Virtual Troy

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and easy to pack.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the multi functions of this tool without compromising durability. Everything packs down really nice and can be stored easily. The company claims this tool is tough. I can see it handling very minor work, but I'd like to give it more time and use before coming to that conclusion. Overall I'm really happy with this tool.
customer_reviews.author: Karla P.

customer_reviews.title: Well-made, arrived quickly, long enough handle with extensions
customer_reviews.text: This is what is described and well-built. I have yet to dig with it, tho the sharpened edge seems a useful camp tool in several ways. Sheaths are well-sewn. LOOKS tough.
customer_reviews.author: Craig L

customer_reviews.title: Great camp shovel
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son and he loves it! I love it too. I ordered another one for myself. Highly recommend this tool.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin James

customer_reviews.title: It all works.
customer_reviews.text: I gave it to my 45 year old son for Christmas. He absolutely loves it. My other three children want them to next Christmas. We all like to go camping, so it worked well in every way.
customer_reviews.author: Incurableromanticist

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tool
customer_reviews.text: This is great, gave it to a friend for Christmas, they love it
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Kirkwood

customer_reviews.title: Misled
customer_reviews.text: Totally disappointed. This is no more than a child’s first shovel. I knew something was wrong when I saw the size of the box. Return.
customer_reviews.author: raymond mason

customer_reviews.title: Amazing tool
customer_reviews.text: I love this tool. It does so many different things. It’s a must have if your camping or traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Charley & Angie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect compact little tool to keep in any vehicle
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first, but after receiving this and taking it it camping the next weekend, I can assure anyone who buys this that it can take a beating. Perfect compact little tool to keep in any vehicle, I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy shovel
customer_reviews.text: Everything I expected and more. Very sturdy shovel and nice attachments inside. I like the locking neck to hold it in place
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Bilicki

customer_reviews.title: Smaller then expected but it’s cool.
customer_reviews.text: Blade side is super dull. It’s much smaller then I expected but it’s okay because it makes it more compact. Overall it’s a pretty cool tool.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Very well made item, sturdy. Great gift for the camper or trail walker!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very well made item, sturdy. Great gift for the camper or trail walker!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lew Wagerly

customer_reviews.title: The shovel is sized right and seems to be well ...
customer_reviews.text: The shovel is sized right and seems to be well constructed. I have not had a chance to use yet. The shovel is extremely light weight. The case is not molle.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Burdsal

customer_reviews.title: I have been really enjoying this shovel. I use ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been really enjoying this shovel. I use it when we go camping and serves it purpose well and I expect it to hold up well. It was a little smaller than expected, however this does make it easier to take with and pack up.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Better than an E-Tool
customer_reviews.text: Better than an E-Tool. this thing is sturdy and amazing. I’m gonna buy the attachment to make it bigger. It’s awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Italiano810

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought it
customer_reviews.text: Light, compact and easy to use. Shovel head is a little smaller than I expected, but that only makes it take up less room and reduces weight. Good design for its intended use.
customer_reviews.author: Dean Pitts

customer_reviews.title: Greatest shovel tool ever.
customer_reviews.text: Really versatile. Good materials. The shovel blade is fiercely sharpened
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: Hopefully you can add alot more color options.
customer_reviews.text: I definitely havent used it yet but I know this item is top quality, the sharpness may not be the best thing but overall you have a small blade with it and its an everything in one, if one doesnt work the other will. This will definitely get you out of a survival situation.
customer_reviews.author: Lorenzo

customer_reviews.title: Great multi-tool shovel!
customer_reviews.text: Saw a video review of this Five Joy shovel. Picked one up.... now I can't wait to get in the back country and use it! Sturdy, well thought out design, yet compact enough to fit in my pack. I can see a few Five Joy backcountry shovels under the Christmas tree.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Shaffer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived as advertised very happy with product it is very versatile has a lot ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as advertised very happy with product it is very versatile has a lot of features emergency whistle. Ferro rod, knife and small saw all in the handle. Very nice product highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: I got this for my husband and he isn't pleased very easy
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband and he isn't pleased very easy, but this he absolutely loves. He uses it mostly for metal detecting so he wishes it could extend since he is over 6ft. Other than that this is perfect for him.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquie

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I keep this in my bushplane. Still using it. Great product so far.
customer_reviews.author: Tim N.

customer_reviews.title: The case is the problem
customer_reviews.text: The product in the bag, ie the shovel, seems to be put together well and I like it’s versatility. The bag left me slightly upset. First order the bag was missing a functional carabiner, the second time the bag’s buckle simply fell apart and I just decided to hot glue it. Shovel five stars so far, bag one star.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Fuson

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: A gift for my son and he really likes this set
customer_reviews.author: Gerry Brink

customer_reviews.title: Effective tool
customer_reviews.text: A little wonder of a well thought tool. You have to learn its layout before you go out in the field. About as good as it could get in the real world. J
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely glad I bought it
customer_reviews.text: It's a little small but very sharp and durable. Definitely glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Dezem

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This tool is fantastic! Did every thing it said it would. Used it a lot on our 3 week Jeep trip through Utah. It's small, portable design makes it easy to stow anywhere. Even used the striker to start a fire. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: brentmurphy

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the $$$
customer_reviews.text: Had this thing for five minutes before I decided to return. Cutting edges completely dull out of the box. Flimsy construction and 60+ for a mini shovel! Are you kidding FiveJoy. Don’t waste your money head to your local army navy surplus. This thing is a joke!
customer_reviews.author: Montana 10th MTN

customer_reviews.title: Best of the best e-tools
customer_reviews.text: Excellent survival/camping tool. Compact. Versitile. Sturdy construction. Top of the line e- tool. Better than my old military issue. I made a great decision when buying this. I think you will too.
customer_reviews.author: D.Smith

customer_reviews.title: ... my new shovel camping this weekend and it performed beautifully. I am impressed by the solid construction
customer_reviews.text: I took my new shovel camping this weekend and it performed beautifully. I am impressed by the solid construction, easy of assembly, and useful tools. Thanks for making a great product. I spend more on the shovel than I had originally planned, but it was well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product!
customer_reviews.text: Does not disappoint. Shows no signs of wear or damage, even after extensive use.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Kuhn

customer_reviews.title: Shovel
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t been able to use fully yet. I am impressed with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Northern

customer_reviews.title: My favorite compact tool next to my leatherman.
customer_reviews.text: Very compact light weight multi tool. Can be used for several task around camp other than a shovel, trenching, or spade tool. Ditched the cover and just used spade shield. Fits in small back pack. Very tough and stout. Highly recommend as a must survival, back pack, vehicle, or hunting tool.
customer_reviews.author: Rowdy Yates

customer_reviews.title: But the bottle opener is garbage. My first beer of the night I tried ...
customer_reviews.text: Mixed thoughts about this shovel. Haven't really used it much yet, but it did chop some wood and dug in the fire pit to put the fire out. But the bottle opener is garbage. My first beer of the night I tried to use this to open it, slipped right off the cap and sliced my finger. The part of the opener that goes under the bottle cap is way too short and doesn't grab the cap sufficiently. If it weren't for that it'd be 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Gent73man

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve not been able to put it to the test on the trail, but from what I can tell quality is 5star!
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: Great for both a casual hiker as well as extreme ...
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, every single part, including the fabric. Great for both a casual hiker as well as extreme survivalist. Definitely a keeper!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry M. Kakol

customer_reviews.title: FiveJoy Shovel C1
customer_reviews.text: I really like this shovel. I wish I could have gotten a larger model. I geuss I'll have to make do with this model, the price was right.
customer_reviews.author: SatchBoogie

customer_reviews.title: Used it for the first time this past weekend for ...
customer_reviews.text: Used it for the first time this past weekend for a camping trip. Didn't get to use all the functions, but it worked well as a hammer to tent stakes, ax, and saw.
customer_reviews.author: Jason C.

customer_reviews.title: Great survival kit
customer_reviews.text: My husband was very happy with this. He asked me to order it and was exactly what he wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Short,light and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Just got back from my first weekend camping with this product and it was really solid. One of the standout tools
customer_reviews.author: Mike Soverns

customer_reviews.title: He is absolutely in love with it
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my boyfriend for the holidays since he loves to camp. He is absolutely in love with it!
customer_reviews.author: K.P.

customer_reviews.title: Compact Auto Emergency Tool
customer_reviews.text: I mainly got this as a compact emergency supply for my car. It fits under the seat perfectly. I like the various components that come with it as an extra backup for my kit but I only intend to really use the shovel feature. It's hefty enough as a shovel to be usable but light enough to not wear you out.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Hatch

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It is so small! The handle is not long enough to help you dig. It is not user friendly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Everything I would expect.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet but seems very well made. Everything I would expect.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

product_meta.title: FiveJoy Military Folding Shovel Multitool (C1) - Portable Foldable Survival Tool - Entrenching Backpack Equipment for Hiking Camping Emergency Car - Bushcraft Gear: Shovels and Accessories Tools Kit
feature_bullets: ⚒ MATERIAL: High-Quality SOLID Carbon Steel (Blade and Knife) and Aerospace Grade Aluminum (Knife)

🔔 ALL-IN-ONE SURVIVAL TOOL - Heavy Duty Shovel, Sharp Axe Blade, Serrated Saw Edge, Hammer, Paracord...Check! We’ve got all the must-haves for surviving in the outdoors covered. Conveniently dig trenches with this versatile multifunctional tool with a hidden rescue knife and saw, emergency whistle, fire starter (magnesium rod), bottle opener, and more!

⛺ COMPACT, PORTABLE MULTI TOOL - Lightweight (only 1.2lbs), and amazingly compact, this is an essential gadget to add to your outdoor first aid survival kit/ gear. Easily fit this foldable entrenching tool in your backpack or the trunk of your vehicle. Dig your car tires out of snow, mud, or ice, or use the shovel head as a glass breaker in an emergency. Attach the included carrying case to your belt for convenient access while on the trail or hunt.

🔥 VIRTUALLY INDESTRUCTIBLE - Forged from heat-treated High-Quality SOLID Carbon Steel (Blade and Knife) and Aerospace Grade Aluminum (Knife), for maximum strength and lifetime durability. Rust, water, and fracture resistant. Go ahead- PUT IT TO THE TEST!

🔒 UNIQUE LOCK ADJUSTMENT- Unlike other shovels, you can adjust the shovel angle with its special screw locking device, making it simple to alternate functions and positions. Spade can be used 30°, 85° or 180° angle as hook, hoe or shovel.

✔️ ERGONOMIC DESIGN - Thoughtfully engineered handle optimizes comfort and control for all glove types to minimize hand fatigue. Slip-proof foam cushion on the aluminum handle is water-resistant, quick to dry, and perfect for recreational gardening or on your backcountry hike or cross country trips. Always be prepared with this tactical folding tool!
